action.name: Set text
action.param: "Hold LEFT to fire the machine gun"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "use Right mouse for machine gun secondary fire"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "A and S to aim the cannon Press Space to Fire Cannon"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Cannon must be reloaded after every shot. You can swap out for a new ammo with 'Q'and 'E'"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "You should have learned all the basics right now and we're apporaching the enemy so be ready. Survive through them for 2 miniutes 30 seconds"

sub-events.comment: Cannon has reloading state and cannot fire when reloading. Adjust the bullet angle by a random amount (-4 to +4 degrees) to add some inaccuracy to the firing.
If a bullet hits an enemy, subtract 10 from its health. When an enemy runs out of health, destroy it.
Enemy with KillonSprint = 1 will be killed when sprint on it

action.name: Set text
action.param: "boss imcoming Defend it's attack by shooting the projectile use cannon to defend the stronger beam"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Stage 1 is clear End of Alpha presentation Prese ESC to pause and quit the stage"

events.comment: Make New Event Sheet for Tank control only and for other stage layout, copy using "Include Sheet"
